Rule.name: Test Rule Leaver
Rule.Description: This example is for Leaver reassignment. This simple example returns the manager's name if identityname has a amanger, otherwise returns 'spadmin'.

Argument.name: log
Argument.Description: The log object associated with the SailPointContext.

Argument.name: context
Argument.Description: A sailpoint.api.SailPointContext object that can be used to query the database if necessary.

Argument.name: identityName
Argument.Description: The name of the identity whose artifacts are being reassigned during Leaver.

Argument.name: reassignee
Argument.Description: The name of the identity to whom the artifacts of identityName should be reassigned
